project_descr: Sector plan for phase-out of HCFCs in the Industrial and Commercial Refrigeration and Air Conditioning (ICR) Sector in China (Stage-II) for compliance with 2020 targets Project

outputs.output_descr: ICR Stage II is established for phasing ODS, and expected to develop solution for sustainable management of natural resources, ecosystem services, chemicals and waste, ultimately making more people enjoy a cleaner, healthier environment.
